freenet.io.comm
Interface IncomingPacketFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
FNPPacketMangler
public interface IncomingPacketFilter

Filter interface used by Freenet to decrypt incoming UDP packets.

See Also:
OutgoingPacketMangler

Method Summary
 boolean isDisconnected(PeerContext context)
          Is the given connection closed?
 void process(byte[] buf, int offset, int length, Peer peer, long now)
          Process an incoming packet.
 

Method Detail

process

void process(byte[] buf,
             int offset,
             int length,
             Peer peer,
             long now)
Process an incoming packet. This method should call USM.decodePacket() and USM.checkFilters() if necessary to decode and dispatch messages.

Parameters:
buf - The buffer to read from. Note that this may be reused later on; any data to keep must be copied.
offset - The offset to start reading from.
length - The length in bytes to read.
peer - The peer which sent us the packet. We only know the Peer because it's incoming; we are supposed to create or find PeerContext's for the Message's.
now - The exact time at which the packet was received.

isDisconnected

boolean isDisconnected(PeerContext context)
Is the given connection closed?
